notes: Multi-platform Dreamcast/NAOMI/Atomiswave emulator. Standalone save files are vmu_save_A1.bin etc in data directory. RetroArch core saves to system/dc/vmu_save_*.bin
Windows-only closed-source emulator. VMU saves as vms00.bin in emulator directory. NVRAM files in nvram subfolder. Requires Atomiswave BIOS.
